summary.span: 通知 ASP.NET 正在 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 上运行的某个特定应用程序配置为预加载。

span.span: Notifies ASP.NET that a particular application that is running on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] is configured to be preloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现方法接口。This method implements the method of the interface. [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 调用方法通知 ASP.NET 应用程序正在加载是否支持预加载。 calls the method to notify ASP.NET whether the application that is being loaded supports preloading. > [!NOTE] > 此方法仅适用于在运行的应用程序[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]。This method applies only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现方法接口。This method implements the method of the interface. 该方法将创建的实例类型，调用到[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]来获取预加载的信息。The method creates an instance of the type, which calls into [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to get preloading information. > [!NOTE] > 此方法仅适用于在运行的应用程序[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]。This method applies only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)].

exception.span: 包含预加载应用程序的信息的 实例不是 。
